text: Francis Loomis may refer to: * Francis B. Loomis (1861–1948), 25th United States Assistant Secretary of State * Francis Loomis (lieutenant governor) (1812–1892), Lieutenant Governor of Connecticut, 1877–1879 * Francis Wheeler Loomis (1889–1976), American scientist * Francis B. Loomis Jr. (1903–1989), United States Marine Corps general ==See also== * Frank Loomis (1896–1971), American athlete * Loomis (surname)
title: Francis Loomis
